mapper.select: select m3.mno,m3.name,m3.email,m3.password,m3.company,m3.dept,m3.rolename, m3.regDate, m3.modiDate, m3.Organizer, em3.title"joined" from ( select m2.mno,m2.name, email,password,company,dept,rolename,regDate,modiDate,title"Organizer" from ( select m2.mno,m2.name,m2.email,m2.password,m2.company,m2.dept,r2.rolename,m2.regDate,m2.modiDate from tbl_member m2 left join ( -- role + roleCode select member_no, rolename from tbl_role r join tbl_roleList_code rc on r.role_no = rc.rlno )r2 on m2.mno = r2.member_no where mno > 0 order by mno desc ) as m2 left join ( -- member + meeting (개설자) select mtno,title,mno,name from tbl_meeting me1 right join tbl_member m1 On me1.openMember = m1.mno ) as mm2 on m2.mno = mm2.mno ) m3 left join ( select * from tbl_meeting me1 join tbl_entryMember em1 on me1.mtno = em1.meeting_no ) em3 on m3.mno = em3.member_no where m3.mno > 0 order by m3.mno desc
